attributes.action: Guarantee that the electorate of UK will have a public referendum on the acceptance of any EU constitution or treaty handing powers to the European government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as citizens of a democratic U.K should be given the opportunity to elect representatives for our government. Any decision to hand our and our elected governments power to unelected ministers should be debated and voted on in a referendum. We give our powers as citizens to our representatives and for them to hand over power without our consent and in the disguise of a 'treaty' is a monstrosity!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
